00027 // DEBUG ONLY - Sets the error reporting level to the highest possible value

00029 
00030 /**
00031  * Class for the TCA 'input' field
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 class tx_oop_Tca_Field_Input extends tx_oop_Tca_Field
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * The type of the field
00042      */
00043     protected $_fieldType = 'input';
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * Adds an eval rule to the field
00047      * 
00048      * @param   string  The rule type (required , trim, date, datetime, time, timesec, year, int, upper, lower, alpha, num, alphanum, alphanum_x, nospace, md5, is_in, password, double2, unique, uniqueInPid, tx_*)
00049      */
00050     public function addEval( $rule )
00051     {
00052         if( !isset( $this->_config[ 'eval' ] ) ) {
00053             
00054             $this->_config[ 'eval' ] = '';
00055             
00056         }
00057         
00058         if(    $rule === 'required'
00059             || $rule === 'trim'
00060             || $rule === 'date'
00061             || $rule === 'datetime'
00062             || $rule === 'time'
00063             || $rule === 'timesec'
00064             || $rule === 'year'
00065             || $rule === 'int'
00066             || $rule === 'upper'
00067             || $rule === 'lower'
00068             || $rule === 'alpha'
00069             || $rule === 'num'
00070             || $rule === 'alphanum'
00071             || $rule === 'alphanum_x'
00072             || $rule === 'nospace'
00073             || $rule === 'md5'
00074             || $rule === 'is_in'
00075             || $rule === 'password'
00076             || $rule === 'double2'
00077             || $rule === 'unique'
00078             || $rule === 'uniqueInPid'
00079             || substr( $rule, 0, 3 ) === 'tx_'
00080         ) {
00081             
00082             $this->_config[ 'eval' ] = ( strlen( $this->_config[ 'eval' ] ) ) ? ',' . $rule : $rule;
00083             
00084         } else {
00085             
00086             throw new tx_oop_Tca_Field_Input_Exception(
00087                 'The \'\' eval rule is not a valid eval rule',
00088                 tx_oop_Tca_Field_Input_Exception::EXCEPTION_INVALID_EVAL
00089             );
00090         }
00091     }
00092     
00093     /**
00094      * 
00095      */
00096     public function setRange( $lower, $upper )
00097     {
00098         $this->_config[ 'range' ] = array(
00099             'upper' => $upper,
00100             'lower' => $lower
00101         );
00102     }
00103 }
